content.description: The following question refers to the topic of crisis, upheaval, and revolution in the eighteenth century.
content.question: In 1815 the immediate political result of the French Revolution and the Napoleonic Wars was

choices.label: the reestablishment of conservative monarchies across much of Europe
the adoption of republican forms of government by most European states
the recreation of the Holy Roman Empire
the unification of Italy and Germany as nation-states

content.answer: the reestablishment of conservative monarchies across much of Europe

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
